original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#fff999>$city1</color>使用知己知彼計謀失敗。(<color=#bceea7>知己知彼 失敗</color>)
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent someone to use <color=#fff999>$city1</color> to use the strategy of knowing yourself and knowing the enemy and failed. (<color=#bceea7>Knowing yourself, knowing the enemy, failing</color>)
